description: A1, A2 - Understand and use basic everyday expressions and simple phrases. Can engage in basic conversations about immediate needs and personal details.
B1 - Comprehend the main points of clear input on familiar topics. Can produce simple connected text and interact in everyday situations with some fluency.
B2 and above - Understand complex text and communicate fluently and spontaneously. Can express ideas precisely and summarize information from different sources effectively.
